Home.description: Ensuring Safety, Compliance and Efficiency in Maritime Operations

_why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Mediterranean Shipping Register?
_why_choose_us.desc: Trust MSR for a seamless and professional maritime registration experience.

content.title: International Accreditation
content.desc: Recognized by major maritime authorities, ensuring compliance with global standards and regulations.

content.title: Fast Turnaround Time
content.desc: Efficient registration and certification processes to minimize delays and keep your operations running smoothly.

content.title: Expert Technical Staff
content.desc: Highly qualified professionals providing reliable support and guidance for all your maritime needs.

content.title: Competitive Pricing
content.desc: Cost-effective solutions without compromising on quality or service excellence.

_request_form.desc: Contact our team for fast and reliable classification services.
_request_form.after_fill: Once you've downloaded and completed the form, you can submit it here. Our manager will process your request.

_services_block.desc: We ensure that every vessel meets the highest international standards of safety, structural integrity, and operational efficiency.

services.title: Newbuilding Classification
services.desc: We provide full support throughout the shipbuilding process â€” from the approval of design documentation to the final commissioning. Our mission is to ensure full compliance with international standards, class society requirements, and flag state regulations.

services.title: Periodic Surveys & Certification
services.desc: Regular surveys are essential for the safe and lawful operation of any vessel. We conduct periodic inspections in line with class and statutory requirements, ensuring continued compliance and readiness for sea.

services.title: Structural Assessment
services.desc: We carry out detailed structural assessments to evaluate the vessel's condition, identify critical areas of concern, and provide recommendations for repair or reinforcement. These evaluations are key to extending service life and ensuring safety at sea.

services.title: Risk-Based Inspection Plan
services.desc: Our Risk-Based Inspection plans are tailored to each vesselâ€™s design, history, and operating profile. By focusing on critical systems and potential failure points, RBI allows for a more efficient, targeted inspection strategy.

meta.description: We are independent multiservice company dedicated to serve the global maritime industry.
meta.title: About Us

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
